name: WARRIOR SPIRIT
description:
WARRIOR SPIRIT™ is a single-player 3D adventure video game for all ages.
The Player takes control of Warrior Spirit, a servant of True Good. Warrior Spirit wears the Divine Helmet, the core vehicle used to manifest energy through a body made of clay.
Use Warrior Spirit's many abilities for platforming, combat, and exploring.
-Warrior Spirit's clay body is agile, being able to run and jump high.
-Warrior Spirit's Divine Bracelets are used to dash at high speeds, jump very far, run up and along walls, and even zoom over bodies of water.
-The Warrior Spirit's four Divine Arms are used to defeat Clay Monsters, swing from structures, leap higher, grab ledges, solve various puzzles with Clay, and more.
-Collect Sand Dollars to spend at Spirit Kilns and use Life Clay to restore health.
-Make sure to talk to characters in-game to find out more.
This pre-alpha demo has players explore the very first area of this adventure, Temple Blossom.
The upcoming full video game will feature the rest of the experience, hosting a variety of large areas and lands for the player to adventure through and resolve conflicts caused by Transcendent Evil.
Music by Max Salazar
In addition to that, this pre-alpha demo lacks a variety of features, visuals, sounds, effects, optimization, and graphical elements that will be in the final release. Pre-alpha is an early stage of development, this is a work in progress and the content is subject to change.
WARRIOR SPIRIT™ is best experienced with a gamepad/controller
